preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 60.00 g of silver(I) oxide using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure 30.00 g of antimony(III) selenide and 6.00 g of selenium powder.

 4. Gradually add 4.00 g of polyvinyl alcohol binder to the mixture while stirring continuously until a thick paste forms.
